Anti-Venom 4, 8 Air date April 3, 2016 Written by Matt Wayne Directed by Jae Woo Kim <font-family:Trajan Pro;font color="white">Episode Guide previous

Force of Nature

"{{{1}}}"

Anti-Venom is the eighth episode of the fourth season of Ultimate Spider-Man.

Synopsis[]

Doc Ock and his new assistant, Michael Morbius, create Anti-Venom in order to destroy one of the Web-Warriors.

Plot[]

Characters[]

Main Characters[]

Web-Warriors

Spider-Man/Peter Parker

Agent Venom/Flash Thompson

Patrioteer/Harry Osborn/Anti-Venom

Supporting Characters[]

Oscorp

Iron Patriot/Norman Osborn

S.H.I.E.L.D.

Dr. Curt Connors

Villains[]

Hydra

Doctor Octopus/Dr. Otto Octavius

Dr. Michael Morbius

Arnim Zola

Beetle/Abner Jenkins

Shocker/Herman Schultz

Shriek/Frances Barrison (cameo)

Grizzly/Maxwell Markham (cameo)

Other Characters[]

Nick Fury (mentioned)

Boomerang/Fred Myers (mentioned)

Cast[]

Drake Bell as Spider-Man/Peter Parker

Dee Bradley Baker as Dr. Curt Connors and HYDRA Soldier

Benjamin Diskin as Dr. Michael Morbius

Mark Hamill as Arnim Zola

Tom Kenny as Doctor Octopus/Dr. Otto Octavius

Matt Lanter as Agent Venom/Flash Thompson, Patrioteer/Harry Osborn and Anti-Venom

Steven Weber as Iron Patriot/Norman Osborn

Trivia[]

This is Anti-Venom's first animated appearance.
